name: Dream (itch) (CN01)
description:
Dream by Christine Nguyen

Follow the character, who's an insomniac, as they venture across changing courses collecting sand from the sandman to help them fall asleep. You'll start out in a place not far from reality but eventually, get pulled into a dreamlike world.

Credits:
Base Code by Michael Baker
